source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a traditional wooden building with a tiled roof, featuring intricate carvings on the beams and a partially open door. A sign indicating 'No Smoking' is visible next to the building, and a wooden fence surrounds the area. As the camera moves left, more of the building's structure and the surrounding environment come into view, including a pathway lined with greenery and additional buildings in the background. The camera continues to pan left, revealing a street with trees and more buildings, and the pathway extends further into the distance.
